Bulletin

Feb 10, 2021

I'm back in Toronto and fortunately I still like snow. I've got a new mac and a very suburban winter view. Time for some good typing.

What's New

I spent time on the little things that are more felt than seen. Fixed every bug reported on the forum, and improved the performance of moving cards by over 20%.
